name: Throw Illusion Shield
description:
throws an illusion shield at your target for 85 - 115 + 100% Weapon Damage and causes it to richochet off to an additional target. 

Additional ricochets beyond the first richochet can be increased via the Shield Throw Bonus Ricochets statistic. 

Damage is reduced by 30% per each ricochet up to a maximum of a 60% reduction.
